name: Explosive Candy World
description:
Forget about running and jumping. In Explosive Candy World you have to EXPLODE your way to the end of the level!

It's a physics-based platformer game with a fun and weird movement mechanic.

Use your mouse or analog stick to adjust the strength, then release to throw a mighty explosive candy! Throw it at buttons, switches, breakable stuff, or even at yourself!



Features

  • Over 80 explosive levels scattered across 4 candy worlds (+ 1 secret world)
  • Cute, colorful pixel art
  • Original retro soundtrack
  • An unusual platformer, for fans of the genre who are tired of samey gameplay
  • The game has absolutely zero text, except for names and numbers. It's non-stop gameplay, with no reading!

You can totally win by being good at the game, but sometimes lucky things such as these are gonna happen
